item.title: Monday.com
item.description: Monday.com is the visual work management platform that transforms how teams collaborate on projects. With its colorful, intuitive boards and powerful automation, it makes project tracking engaging and efficient for teams of all sizes. Used by over 180,000 customers including Coca-Cola, BD, and Universal Music Group, Monday.com adapts to any workflow while keeping everyone aligned. Its strength lies in making complex project management feel simple through visual design and smart automation.
